pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:7.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:7.2: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhessati na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:7.3: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karotī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:7.6: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhessati na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:7.7: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:7.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭheyya na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:14.1: “Neva upaṭṭhessāmi, na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:14.2: Antevāsiniṃ vā anupasampannaṃ vā neva upaṭṭheti, na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
